com.yahoo.bullet.dsl.converter

Class POJOBulletRecordConverter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.yahoo.bullet.dsl.converter.BulletRecordConverter
      • com.yahoo.bullet.dsl.converter.POJOBulletRecordConverter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    public class POJOBulletRecordConverter
extends BulletRecordConverter
    POJOBulletRecordConverter is used to convert POJOs to BulletRecord.

    If a schema is not specified, the POJOBulletRecordConverter constructed will convert all valid fields (with valid types) and log a warning for each invalid field. If a schema is specified, method names in addition to member names can be used in references.

    Note, POJOBulletRecordConverter uses reflections and is relatively slow; specifying getters in the schema will lead to slightly better performance. Furthermore, the converter only finds declared fields and methods and does not look into superclasses or interfaces.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
